introduction.line1: Highly motivated and detail-oriented Junior Frontend Developer specializing in React and Next.js, with hands-on experience building web applications.
introduction.line2: Developed and delivered over 30 projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams.
introduction.line3: Passionate about transforming UX/UI designs into responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
introduction.line4: Dedicated to continuous growth through coding bootcamps and online courses.
